name: chat-bot-desktop
description: A desktop chat application with real-time messaging
author: Your Name <your.email@example.com>

scripts.dev: npm install && concurrently -n server,client,electron -c blue,green,magenta "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix electron"
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix client && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.postinstall: npm i --prefix server && npm i --prefix client
